column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
provides development tools and libraries for building packages
provides firmware files for Linux devices
provides headers and scripts for building modules
is the graphical server. This first one may take a while as it pulls many other dependencies first on clean installs
provides common files for the X server
manages screen resolution and monitor settings
modifies keymaps and pointer button mappings
is a tool for detecting window properties
gives pipewire compatibility with PulseAudio programs
installs Python applications in isolated environments
provides the sans and serif fonts
serves as a modern text editor
offers enhanced cat with syntax highlighting
is the patrician's choice video player
is for transparency and removing screen-tearing
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems
allows for copying and pasting from the command line
provides window action utilities on the command line
can download any YouTube video when given the link
manages and gives information about archives
provides syntax highlighting in the shell
queues commands or files for download
enables the mounting of cell phones
is a graphical and colorful system monitor
provides the window manager (dwm-flexipatch), terminal (st), status bar (dwmblocks), and application launcher (dmenu)
